system.description: The character is a hired killer. They might tell themselves that this is for the greater good. They might be picky about who they take on as clients or targets, but at the core of their occupation is ending lives.
The character knows how things are handled on the street who's in charge of various criminal enterprises and how ta avoid issues with them
The character is a villain, someone who cares little for the rights of others, up to and including their right to live.
system.restriction: The character cannot also be Heroic.

system.description: The character knows someone with access to and knowledge of a particular field. The connection could be a reporter, a police officer, a politician, a mobster and soon. By making an Egocheck, the character can call an their contact to provide help in the form of clues, informntion or resources, The Narrrator determines the TN of the Ego check based on the favor requested This trait can be selected multiple thmes, using many different types, These include Celebrities, Community, Criminal, Espionage, Military, Outsiders, Police, Professional, Sources, Super Heroes and so on

The character is known for favoring a particular kind of weapon or attack pewer. They have an edge when making attacks that way. This trait can be taken more than once, but each time must be with a different kind of weapon or attack power.
